title: Software Engineer
description: My name is Dmitri and I am Software Engineer with over 12 years of commercial professional experience. With main focus on .NET/MVC.NET/Blazor and React/Next.js
listed_desc: Over 12 years of experience in software industry primarly as an Application Developer
Expertise in C#, .NET, Javascript, ReactJS, Next.js, TypeScript, Microsoft SQL Server and MySQL, Docker
Strong experience with .NET MVC, Blazor, Bootstrap and TailwindCSS, JQuery, AngularJS, VueJS, KnockoutJS
Done programming in Java and PHP in the past
Great communication skills and ability to work in teams on large scale projects
